data.caption: Announcement Under Regulation 30 Of The SEBI (LODR)
data.news_body: Announcement under regulation 30 of SEBI (LODR) - Clarification on Movement in Price of the Shares

data.caption: Clarification sought from Anand Rathi Share And Stock Brokers Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from Anand Rathi Share And Stock Brokers Ltd on November 17 2025 with reference to significant movement in price in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.

data.caption: Listing of Equity Shares of Anand Rathi Share And Stock Brokers Ltd
data.news_body: Trading Members of the Exchange are hereby informed that effective from September 30 2025 the equity shares of Anand Rathi Share And Stock Brokers Ltd (Scrip Code: 544530) are listed and admitted to dealings on the Exchange in the list of B Group Securities. For further details please refer to the notice no. 20250929- dated September 29 2025.
